manifest.name: Custom Note Width
manifest.description: Let's you adjust the line width on a note-by-note basis.
manifest.author: 0skater0

data.manifestValue: Let's you adjust the line width on a note-by-note basis.
data.communityListValue: Effortlessly change the line width of each note individually. Provides multiple ways to customize the experience, making it both efficient and user-friendly to adjust line widths.
